## Preparation

### Computing Setup (Complete Before Class)

To ensure a smooth experience during class, **complete these steps before January 12**:

1.  **Install R (v4.4 or later)**

    -   [CRAN Download](https://cloud.r-project.org/)

2.  **Install RStudio Desktop** (or Positron)

    -   [RStudio Download](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/)
    -   Alternative: [Positron](https://positron.posit.co/) (newer IDE from Posit)

3.  **Install Quarto**

    -   [Quarto Installation](https://quarto.org/docs/get-started/)
    -   Verify: `quarto --version` in terminal

4.  **Install Git**

    -   Verify: `git --version` in terminal
    -   Windows: [Git for Windows](https://git-scm.com/download/win)
    -   macOS: Use Xcode Command Line Tools or [Homebrew](https://brew.sh/)

5.  **Create a GitHub Account**

    -   [GitHub Signup](https://github.com/)
    -   Use your UNC email for education benefits

6.  **Set Up Git Credentials**

    -   [Connecting to GitHub with SSH](https://docs.github.com/en/authentication/connecting-to-github-with-ssh)
    -   Or use GitHub CLI: `gh auth login`

7.  **Install Core R Packages**

    ``` r
    install.packages(c(
      "tidyverse",
      "renv",
      "devtools",
      "broom",
      "here",
      "quarto"
    ))
    ```
